items.title: Summon Snapshot Voting on Interim Constitutional Committee
milestones: Milestone 1: Custom front end must allow for login from a wide selection of Cardano wallets including browser-based, mobile, and hardware options. Front end must allow for ranked-choice voting with ballot results collected to the voting database in a cryptographically secure manner.
Milestone 2: Ensure system performance for the Constitutional Committee election and work closely with Intersect staff to monitor and promote the election.
Milestone 3: Export results from the Constitutional Committee election in a way that is both human readable and cryptographically provable for use by Intersect staff.
